long: Meaning: properly, interrogative "what?" (including "how?" "why?" "when?"); but also exclamation, "what!" (including "how!"), or indefinitely "what" (including "whatever", and even relatively, "that which"); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses.  Usage: how (long, oft, (-soever)), (no-) thing, what (end, good, purpose, thing), whereby(-fore, -in, -to, -with), (for) why.  Source: or "מַה"; or "מָ"; or "מַ"; also "מֶה"; a primitive particle;
